name: Vox Proxy Macro File
summary: Learn about .VPM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VPM files can be opened as hyperlinks to execute macro functionality.

description: File used by Vox Proxy, a program used to create talking animated characters in presentations; contains scripted program instructions to invoke Vox Proxy functions; can be used to drive slide shows or animate talking characters.
